entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:26 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:26 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Flurries beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:26 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
